metadata.title: kubernetes-client: Insecure deserialization in unmarshalYaml method (moderate)
metadata.description:
DOCUMENTATION: A arbitrary code execution flaw was found in the Fabric 8 Kubernetes client affecting versions 5.0.0-beta-1 and above. Due to an improperly configured YAML parsing, this will allow a local and privileged attacker to supply malicious YAML. 
            STATEMENT: Red Hat CodeReady Studio 12 is not affected by this flaw because it does not ship a vulnerable version of kubernetes-client; the version that it ships does not use SnakeYAML.

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9 is installed
jenkins-2-plugins is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
